name: Coding track
desc: Get ready for the thrilling Competitive Programming Contest of NITS HACKS 8.0 in association with Coding Club NIT Silchar, held alongside the event Tecnoesis, of NIT Silchar. The thrill and fun of team contests is back, with exciting prizes!
bigdesc: Step into the arena of logic, speed, and precision. Our electrifying Competitive Programming Contest at NITS HACKS 8.0 brings together the brightest minds of the country to tackle algorithmic challenges designed to test your problem-solving abilities at every level. Whether you're a seasoned competitor or an enthusiastic beginner, this contest promises an engaging and intellectually stimulating experience. The Coding Track is open to all undergraduate students across India and will feature a 5-hour ICPC-style contest hosted on Codeforces. Exciting prize pools worth ₹1.1 Lakhs await the top performers, with special awards reserved for the best-performing teams from NIT Silchar. Enter the contest - and let the leaderboard decide the rest.

name: Software track
desc: Welcome to the Software track, the place where idea meets technology. Under this track, participants will have the opportunity to solve real-world challenges across various domains, including AI-driven education, blockchain-based finance, healthcare, and more.Exciting prize pools worth ₹1.3 Lakhs await the top performers, with special awards reserved for the best-performing teams from NIT Silchar
bigdesc:
Get ready to embark on a journey of unparalleled innovation as NITS HACKS, the epicentre of technological brilliance, proudly presents the Software Track - a platform where your coding prowess meets real-world challenges! The Software Track challenges you to push the boundaries of your skills and craft groundbreaking solutions using your preferred tech stack, be it an Android app or a cutting-edge website. Within a specified time limit, participants will immerse themselves in the world of coding, building solutions that transcend the ordinary.
Registration is now open! Please click the provided link to complete your registration. Gear up for the ultimate tech adventure and seize the opportunity to be a part of something extraordinary. Note: For outside teams, travel and accommodation expenses would have to borne by the teams themselves.

name: ui/ux track
desc: The UI/UX Track at NITS HACKS 8.0 offers an engaging opportunity for participants to showcase their design skills within the exciting theme of Star Wars. Participants will tackle two unique problem statements that challenge their creativity and innovation.
bigdesc: Hey Developers! Exciting news, <NITS::HACKS 8.0/> is back with its seventh edition so get ready to unleash your inner creative genius. We’re thrilled to bring back our popular UI/UX track!  After an overwhelming response last year, we’re excited to once again offer this specialised pathway for all you creative visionaries. In this edition, we’re putting a spotlight on UI/UX, giving tech enthusiasts a chance to dive into the captivating world of design and its vital role in technology. The UI/UX track is divided into three stages – mood boarding, designing, and prototyping, challenging all participants to merge creativity and technical prowess flawlessly. The winning team will embody excellence, showcasing a perfect blend of these essential skills. This track is the perfect place to learn, connect, and win big with cash prizes totaling INR 60 K and goodies for the winners.
